description:
Kassan is http://anidb.net/ch142876 [Kazamatsuri Kanshi]`s umbrella that gained a personality of its own due to http://anidb.net/ch142875 [Wakatsuki Nico]`s spell.
Trivia: it`s name is a pun on the words kasa å‚˜ (meaning `umbrella`) and a honorific -san so one could translate it as "Mister Umbrella".
name: Kassan
